availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Breckinridge County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Eleanor Mattingly. Father of Hissenda Mattingly, Sally Mattingly, Eliza Mattingly, Thomas G. Mattingly, B. J. Mattingly, Nicholas B. Mattingly, Emma Mattingly, and Elizabeth Mattingly. Farmer in Marion County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Breckinridge County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District 1, p. 355. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, District 2, p. 59. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, p. 16. Find A Grave, "Gabriel Mattingly (1798-1872)," Memorial #21606551, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=21606551 (accessed June 26, 2017).
